title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4607.7 - Hearings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4607.7 - Hearings

State Regulations

The commission may hold hearings or inquiries at which
the applicant, and its employees and, if the applicant is a corporation, its
officers, directors and stockholders, may be required to appear and testify
under oath respecting the contents of the application. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4607.7

Amended

New

York State Register July 20, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 29, eff. 7/20/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
